titles.title: Unko-san: Tsuiteru Hito ni Shika Mienai Yousei Junjou Ha
うんこさん ツイてる人にしか見えない妖精 純情派

relatedanime.anime: Unko-san: Tsuiteru Hito ni Shika Mienai Yousei

anime.description: The series is effectively the second season of http://anidb.net/a7451 [Unko-san], the 2009 Flash-animated scatological comedy about a character named after the Japanese word for feces. Source: ANN
